overview:
Kamil is the CFO and Co-Founder of Dropifi, an African startup out there to enable businesses both small and large to easily visualise, manage and analyse incoming mails from both customers and prospects.

He has extensive knowledge in accounting and cash flow projections which he obtained from his study and internships at KNUST.

While studying Land Economy, he showed overwhelming interest in IT and Entrepreneurship. His passion and excitement about IT led him to conduct research on how IT can be effectively employed within Ghanaâ€™s land sector agencies. He was also an Entrepreneur-In-Training at Meltwater Entrepreneurial School of Technology where he combines entrepreneurship with software development and works with Java and other languages.

degrees.subject: Land Economy
degrees.institution: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology

milestones.description: Co-founded Dropifi which won the first ever Startup Weekend in Accra, Ghana and further ranked as #3 top tech startup in Africa.
Became CFO of dropifi after it got funded by the Meltwater Foundation
